Module scenebuilder.controls.tooling
Package com.oracle.javafx.scenebuilder.drivers.splitpane

Class SplitPaneDesignInfoX

java.lang.Object
com.oracle.javafx.scenebuilder.drivers.splitpane.SplitPaneDesignInfoX
public class SplitPaneDesignInfoX
extends Object
Some additional verbs for managing SplitPane at design time. This could potentially move to SplitPaneDesignInfo some day.

  • Method Details

    • splitPaneLocalToDividerPosition

      public double splitPaneLocalToDividerPosition​(javafx.scene.control.SplitPane splitPane, double x, double y, boolean clamp, boolean snap)
      Convert from local coordinates to divider position coordinates (0-1).
      Parameters:
      splitPane - split pane subject of the conversion
      x - x in local coordinates
      y - y in local coordinates
      clamp - true if resulting divider position must be clamped in [0,1].
      snap - true if resulting divider position should be rounded to 2 decimals.
      Returns:
      a divider position (between [0, 1] if clamped == true).

    • dividerPositionToSplitPaneLocal

      public double dividerPositionToSplitPaneLocal​(javafx.scene.control.SplitPane splitPane, double position)
      Convert from divider position coordinates (0-1) to local coordinates.
      Parameters:
      splitPane - split pane subject of the conversion
      position - a divider position
      Returns:

    • simulateDividerMove

      public double[] simulateDividerMove​(FXOMObject fxomSplitPane, int dividerIndex, double sceneX, double sceneY)
      Computes what would be the divider positions of splitpane if divider at dividerIndex was moved to (sceneX, sceneY).
      Parameters:
      fxomSplitPane - the splitpane model object to which simulated move applies
      dividerIndex - the index of the divider that should be moved
      sceneX - x of the target position in scene coordinates
      sceneY - y of the target position in scene coordinates
      Returns:
      the array of divider positions after the simulated move
